myCards.question: What is a higher-order component in React?
myCards.answer: higher-order component acts as a container for other components. This helps to keep components simple and enables re-usability. They are generally used when multiple components have to use a common logic.

myCards.question: What is JSX?
myCards.answer: higher-order component acts as a container for other components. This helps to keep components simple and enables re-usability. They are generally used when multiple components have to use a common logic.
